entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 16.
